summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to appropriate the sum of Thirty-six Thousand Nine Hundred Seventy-six and 83/100 ($36,976.83), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the General Fund, to aid in the improvement of Fourth Avenue et al., by regrading the same, as provided under Ordinance No. 14784, creating Local Improvement District No. 1310.
